name: Allspace
description:
Shred space ships with lasers, plasma, and missiles in an epic online multiplayer space battle with Allspace. Up to 100 players can blast each other online.Features:First Person Space Pilot
Online Multiplayer with support for up to 100 players
Highly Optimized (150+ FPS on a modern gaming PC)Online MultiplayerAllspace supports up to 100 players at a time.GameplayAllspace currently supports Deathmatch mode. Additional game modes, including team modes, will be added during Early Access. Join the Discussion forums for Allspace to suggest new games modes and features.Supports Keyboard, Mouse, Game Controller, and JoysticksAll keyboard, mouse, game controller, and joystick controls can be re-mapped to suit each player's unique play style.
